item.title: Testing the system and how it works, 31st December
item.description:

item.title: Flytipping, loads of dog poo bags, 31st December
item.description:
Flytipping under a20 footbridge Sidcup side. Loads of poo bags, bin bags and lots of debris.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thaxted Road, New Eltham

item.title: Parking in communal area of Buckland Court, 31st December
item.description:
Cars have been parking in the communal gardens at Buckland Court for the last year and the problem is getting worse, with 3-4 vehicles parked there most days. The gate needs a new lock and it needs to be closed at all times.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Johns Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in old farm avenue, 31st December
item.description:
There is a large and deep put hole outside number 361 old farm avenue. This goes right back to the concrete and residents are worried this may harm someone if they are ridding in the dark, please can this be looked into on an urgent basis. Pictures of the pothole will follow via email.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 330, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burst water main, 31st December
item.description:
Large amount of water coming out of the floor not sure if pavement or road near kerb,its like a fast waterfall, if continues it will cause another sinkhole like further up colyers lane previously.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Normandy Way, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole that goes down to drainage on Furzefield Close near number 7., 31st December
item.description:
This pot hole has been there for at least 3/4 months and is starting to get larger. There’s a risk of someone tripping, damaging car, child’s foot falling down or if it gets worse the drain cover falling down. The hole is in the middle of the road outside number 7, right next to a drain cover.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Furzefield Close, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 31st December
item.description:
Drains outside No.12 and near No.1 blocked by leaves and rubbish. This end of the street needs regular cleaning due to the shops nearby and rubbish dumped out of visiting parked cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Wilton Road, Colney Hatch, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
